item.title: Company names
item.description: Photo by Duy Pham on Unsplash In conversation with ChatGPT I need you to think like a business strategist or a marketing expert. I have a question about company names, whether I say Club versus Network. Namely, I have two company names to choose from, UCKN Social Network (uckn.net) versus UCKN Social Club (uckn.club). The spirit behind this company is to enable (facilitate) friends and family to connect (check-in) daily. Nothing more, nothing less.
